metadata.name: Potential Persistence Attempt Via Existing Service Tampering
metadata.comment: Detects the modification of an existing service in order to execute an arbitrary payload when the service is started or killed as a potential method for persistence.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sc ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('config ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('binpath=')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sc ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('failure')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('command=')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('failurecommand')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('imagepath')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bin$')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cmd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.js')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.msh$')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.reg$')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.scr')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jar')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.pl')))))

output.summary: Detects the modification of an existing service in order to execute an arbitrary payload when the service is started or killed as a potential method for persistence.
